ibank

Interface Account


  • public interface Account
    Account owned by a bank client.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean deposit(java.math.BigDecimal amount)
      Deposits money into account.
      java.math.BigDecimal getBalance()
      Account balance.
      java.lang.String getHolderName()
      Returns a name of an account holder.
      java.lang.String getNumber()
      A unique account number.
      boolean withdraw(java.math.BigDecimal amount)
      Withdraws money from account.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumber

        java.lang.String getNumber()
        A unique account number.
        Returns:
        account number

      • getHolderName

        java.lang.String getHolderName()
        Returns a name of an account holder.
        Returns:
        account owner

      • getBalance

        java.math.BigDecimal getBalance()
        Account balance. Negative if credit is taken.
        Returns:
        account balance

      • deposit

        boolean deposit(java.math.BigDecimal amount)
        Deposits money into account.
        Parameters:
        amount - amount to deposit
        Returns:
        true if deposit succeeded, false otherwise

      • withdraw

        boolean withdraw(java.math.BigDecimal amount)
        Withdraws money from account. It is not possible to withdraw more than account balance plus the credit limit.
        Parameters:
        amount - amount to withdraw
        Returns:
        true if withdrawal succeeded, false otherwise
